original_title: Hainan expands tax incentives for top talent
article_summary: Hainan expands tax incentives for high-end talent, attracting over 930,000 professionals since 2020. The updated policy now includes aerospace, shipping, and offshore oil industries, and accommodates businesses reliant on mainland China or global markets. The changes aim to balance talent attraction with risk control as Hainan prepares for greater post-special customs operations openness.</s>
